nodes.text: The Teraab sector was a sector located in the Mid Rim. Planets in Teraab included Drogheda, Istic II, Pesmenben IV, Tyne's Horky, and Ruusan.
The Teraab sector was home to the Hoth's Brand system, site of the Ruusan campaign from 1002 BBY to 1000 BBY. The planet Ruusan was the site of the last battles of the New Sith Wars.
Leading up to the Clone Wars the Clawdite assassin Zam Wesell used a Koro-2 exodrive airspeeder that possessed a mining permit registration sticker for the Teraab Sector.
